if-forgot-desc: Seems like you are having difficulty logging in. Have you forgotten your password?
lock-desc: You have had 5 unsuccessful log in attempts, please try again later.
enter-detail-desc: Please enter your details below. If the email is registered to your account, a verification code will be sent.
sent-succ-code-desc: We have sent a verification code to your email {email}, please enter it below to verify.
please-check: Please check spam mail or click here to
succ-desc: The new verification code has been sent to your email.
code-not-recognised: Code not recognised, please check and try again or request a new code.
expired-desc: The verification code had expired. Please request a new code.
error-desc: Verification code requests are limited to 1 new code per minute. Please wait and try again shortly.
request-desc: This verification code has expired. Please click below below to request a new code.
account-locked-desc: Your account is temporarily locked. Please try again after 5 minutes.
